attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I find it hard to believe that Gordon Brown has taken the time to critisize the nation by telling us to stop wasting food when they the government have just voted for the right to keep their expense account allowing them to pay 10,000 on a kitchen or £750 towards a plasma TV paid for with tax payers money.  This government does not act in our nations best interest and I shall never vote for them!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
